item.title: Welcome
item.description:
Hey there!

Welcome to my personal blog. Being a methodical and meticulous person, I like to document and organise things I do. This blog space aims at keeping a stcrutured log of thoughts and initiatives I took and intend to take in the future. Explore at your convenience. In case you are interested in any of it, I’d love to get in touch. Drop in your feedback. Thanks.

Cheers, Sarthak
